title.rendered: BALENCIAGA. FW 2021/22 Haute Couture Show. Streetstyle.

content.rendered:
BALENCIAGA. FW 2021/22 Haute Couture Show. Streetstyle.


Few Street Style Looks from BALENCIAGA. Fall-Winter 2021/22 Haute Couture Show.


Anna Wintour

Sophie Fontanel

Alexandra Golovanoff

Yana Rudkovskaya

Giovanna Battaglia Engelbert 

Christine Alexandra Chiu

Salma Hayek

Renata Litvinova 

Alexia Niedzielski


Amina Muaddi 

James Harden


Photojournalist: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad

Production: Fashionview @fashionview.eu for 24Fashion.tv
